ï»¿RECOMMENDATION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE TO: The President, International Development Association Recommendation of the Committee under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Credit and Grant for the Skills Development Project to the Republic of Malawi. The undersigned Committee constituted under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of International Development Association (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal that the Association grant the Republic of Malawi a credit in an amount equivalent to SDR 29,800,000 and a grant in an amount equivalent to SDR 3,200,000. The purpose of said credit and grant is to increase access, market relevance, and results orientation of supported skills development institutions in agreed priority areas. 1. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to grant such a credit and grant, and of the purpose to which the proceeds of the credit and grant are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the program in support of which the proceeds of such credit and grant are to be applied comes within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said program is designed to promote the economic development of the Republic of Malawi and is of high developmental priority in the light of the needs of the Republic of Malawi. 3. Accordingly, the Committee finds that said program merits financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommends said program for such assistance.
